content.rendered:
In a high school, an epidemic breaks out and spreads quickly. Infected people become extremely violent, and vulnerable students have to fight for survival and deliverance.”

Number of seasons: 1 (2022- )

Status: Ongoing

Creator: Chun Sung-il, JQ Lee

Channel: Netflix

Starring: Ji-hu Park, Chan-Young Yoon, Yi-Hyun Cho
